messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: Listing past achievements and future commitments in areas such as economy, taxation, health, and education.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain; Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids.
Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers; Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly; Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors; Guarantee mental health equality by increasing the health spending by £8bn a year.
Protect education spending from cradle to college.

mentions.candidate: Help Michael Green deliver even more

issues.economy: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain.
issues.education: Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids; Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors; Guarantee mental health equality by increasing the health spending by £8bn a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: Michael is a proven local campaigner, who will fight against over-development and for protection of the Green Belt.

contactInformation.address: H&LS Lib Dems, 9 Avenue Road, Bishops Stortford, CM23 5NS

images.caption: Michael Green engaging with constituents and campaigning.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Michael will be a local champion for Hertford, Ware, Bishop’s Stortford and surrounding villages in Westminster. Michael will support local Lib Dem campaigns to save Ware Arts Centre, to install a splash pad in Hartham Park and to upgrade the swimming pool in Bishop’s Stortford.
